import os
import pandas as pd
import socket
import sys
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import shutil

sys.path.append("/home/jovyan/max.ai.ds.core/")
import pytest
from unittest.mock import patch, MagicMock

import pyspark
from pyspark import SparkContext, SparkConf
from pyspark.sql import SparkSession, SQLContext

import numpy as np
from maxairesources.utilities.data_connectors import DataFrame
from sklearn import datasets, ensemble, model_selection


py_config = {
          "id": 1,
          "name": "sample_task",
          "conf": {
            "id": "sample_task",
            "input": [
              {
                "port": 1,
                "type": "spark",
                "sourceDetails": {
                "encryption_enabled":True,
                "encrypt_key":"hello",
                "encrypt_prefix":"f_",
                  "source": "s3",
                  "fileFormat": "parquet",
                  "filePath": f"file:///{os.getcwd()}/temp/data_connector/sample_output.parquet"
                }

                "type": "pandas",

              {

[docs]class TestDataConnector(object):

[docs]    @classmethod
    def setup_class(cls):
        cls.spark = (
            SparkSession.builder.master("local[2]")
            .appName("test_data_connector")
            .getOrCreate()
        )
        os.mkdir("temp")

        
        


[docs]    @classmethod   
    def load_sample_data(self):
        adult_data = datasets.fetch_openml(name='adult', version=2, as_frame='auto')
        adult = adult_data.frame
        adult['class'] = adult['class'].map({'<=50K':1,'>50K':0})
        adult['workclass'] = adult['workclass'].astype(object).replace(np.nan, None)
        adult['occupation'] = adult['occupation'].astype(object).replace(np.nan, None)
        adult['native-country'] = adult['native-country'].astype(object).replace(np.nan, None)
        spark_df = self.spark.createDataFrame(adult)   
        pandas_df = adult  
        return pandas_df,spark_df



[docs]    def test_write_encrypytion_spark_parquet(self):
        pandas_df,spark_df = self.load_sample_data()
        df_obj = DataFrame(spark_conn=self.spark)
        output_config_for_task = py_config['conf']['output']
        df_obj.write(spark_df,output_config_for_task,1)

        original_columns = spark_df.columns
        filePath = output_config_for_task[0]['sourceDetails']['filePath']
        encrypted_data = self.spark.read.parquet(filePath)
        encrypted_columns = encrypted_data.columns
        assert original_columns != encrypted_columns



[docs]    def test_write_encrypytion_pandas_csv(self):
        pandas_df,spark_df = self.load_sample_data()
        df_obj = DataFrame(spark_conn=self.spark)
        output_config_for_task = py_config['conf']['output']
        df_obj.write(pandas_df,output_config_for_task,2)

        original_columns = pandas_df.columns.tolist()
        filePath = output_config_for_task[1]['sourceDetails']['filePath']
        encrypted_data = pd.read_csv(filePath)
        encrypted_columns = encrypted_data.columns.tolist()
        assert original_columns != encrypted_columns



[docs]    def test_read_encrypytion_spark_parquet(self):
        pandas_df,spark_df = self.load_sample_data()
        df_obj = DataFrame(spark_conn=self.spark)
        input_config_for_task = py_config['conf']['input']
        decrypted_data = df_obj.get(input_config_for_task,1)

        original_columns = spark_df.columns
        decrypted_columns = decrypted_data.columns
        assert original_columns == decrypted_columns



[docs]    def test_read_encrypytion_pandas_csv(self):
        pandas_df,spark_df = self.load_sample_data()
        df_obj = DataFrame(spark_conn=self.spark)
        input_config_for_task = py_config['conf']['input']
        decrypted_data = df_obj.get(input_config_for_task,2)

        original_columns = pandas_df.columns.tolist()
        decrypted_columns = decrypted_data.columns.tolist()
        assert original_columns == decrypted_columns

        

[docs]    def test_write_without_encryption(self):
        pandas_df,spark_df = self.load_sample_data()
        df_obj = DataFrame(spark_conn=self.spark)
        output_config_for_task = py_config['conf']['output']
        df_obj.write(pandas_df,output_config_for_task,3)
        
        original_columns = pandas_df.columns.tolist()
        filePath = output_config_for_task[2]['sourceDetails']['filePath']
        encrypted_data = pd.read_csv(filePath)
        encrypted_columns = encrypted_data.columns.tolist()
        assert original_columns == encrypted_columns

        

[docs]    def test_read_without_encryption(self):
        pandas_df,spark_df = self.load_sample_data()
        df_obj = DataFrame(spark_conn=self.spark)
        input_config_for_task = py_config['conf']['input']
        decrypted_data = df_obj.get(input_config_for_task,3)

        original_columns = pandas_df.columns.tolist()
        decrypted_columns = decrypted_data.columns.tolist()
        assert original_columns == decrypted_columns

        
        

[docs]    @classmethod
    def teardown_class(cls):
        cls.spark.stop()
        shutil.rmtree("temp")
